name: add-loader-u15-bobfix
title: Add Loaders - Bob's Compatibility
author: ImmortalZypther
description: Adds regular, fast, and express loader to default game. Adds Faster and Extremely Fast loader to Bob's Logistics. Fixes graphic for Extremely Fast Loader to stop crashing. You do not need to have Bob's Logistics to use this mod, you just won't have the Faster and Extremely Fast loaders.
